markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Iron Cudgel](/Equipment.aspx?ID=219)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 567 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 900 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Brutal Finish</row></row>

 

 

**Requirement** You are a master with the affixed weapon
</row>

</column>

---

This miniature iron cudgel is typically affixed to a weapon by an iron chain. When you activate the cudgel, you use [Brutal Finish](/Feats.aspx?ID=406), as the fighter feat. You must meet the normal requirements, including those of the press trait.

 If you have the Brutal Finish feat, add two additional weapon damage dice on a success or a failure.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Iron Cudgel
requirement: You are a master with the affixed weapon
requirement_markdown: You are a master with the affixed weapon

text: <title level="1" right="Item 14" pfs="Standard" > Iron Cudgel Source Core Rulebook pg. 567 4.0 Price 900 gp Usage affixed to a weapon Activate Single Action Brutal Finish Requirement You are a master with the affixed weapon --- This miniature iron cudgel is typically affixed to a weapon by an iron chain. When you activate the cudgel, you use Brutal Finish, as the fighter feat. You must meet the normal requirements, including those of the press trait. If you have the Brutal Finish feat, add two additional weapon damage dice on a success or a failure.
